name: Snacky
description: Light and crispy Sunfeast Snacky is a biscuit you simply can’t get enough of. We suggest you try our Salted Masti Crackers which are sprinkled with salt and baked to perfection. You could even add some more spice to your life with Chilli Twist Crackers, the only cracker biscuit in India made from the finest chilli flakes, to delight your senses!
